citation_details.title: Examining the effects of biofield therapy through simultaneous assessment of electrophysiological and cellular outcomes
citation_details.author: L Cohen, A Delorme, A Cusimano, S Chakraborty
citation_details.abstract: In this case study, a self-described biofield therapy (BT) practitioner (participant) took part in  multiple (n= 60) treatment and control (non-treatment) sessions under double-blind
citation_details.short_author: L Cohen, A Delorme, A Cusimano, S Chakraborty
